description: Deep thread - 3rd hop in conversation chain

mailgun_payload.subject: Re: Interested in 2024 Honda Accord
mailgun_payload.body-plain:
Perfect! The blue color sounds great and the financing terms work for me. When can I schedule a test drive?

Also, do you have any current promotions or incentives available?

Thanks again,
John
